transcript.title: ARRANGEMENTS FOR MEDIA - PRIME MINISTERS SYDNEY MEETING
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER 8/ 92
ARRANGEMENTS FOR MEDIA PRIME MINISTER'S SYDNEY MEETINGS
Meetings with business and union leaders will take place in
the Prime Minister's office at 70 Phillip Street ( ANZ
McCaughn Building) on Monday 20 and Tuesday 21 January.
A media room has been made available on the 11th floor of
the ANZ McCaughn Building.
Media must carry identification for entry onto the 11th
floor.
Media will be advised of details of picfacs and availability
of Ministers by the Prime Minister's office at the ANZ
McCaughn Building tomorrow ( Monday).
19 January

The following is a schedule of meetings with Mr Keating,
Mr Dawkins, Mr Willis and Senator Button on Monday and
Tuesday this week in Sydney.
MONDAY 20 JANUARY
9.30am Mr Norman Fussell
Executive General Manager and Director, Commercial
Mount Isa Mines Holdings Limited
10.30am Mr Robert Johnson
Chief Executive
Toyota Motor Sales Australia Limited
Mr John Conimos
Managing Director
Toyota Motor Sales Australia Limited
11.30am Mr Brian Finn
General Manager
IBM Australia Limited
12.30am Working Lunch:
Mr Richard Warburton
Group Managing Director
Du Pont ( Australia) Limited
Mr Michael Nugent
Chief Executive
Goodman Fielder Wattie Limited
Mr Kevin Kirby
Chairman James N Kirby Pty Limited
2.30pm Mr John Farrell
Managing Director
Oceanfast Pty Ltd
Mr Don Johnston
Chairman Oceanfast Pty Ltd
3.30pm Mr John Ralph AO
Managing Director/ Chief Executive
CRA Limited
Mr Gary Pemberton
Group Managing Director
Brambles Industries Limited

TUESDAY 21 JANUARY
10.30am Sir Eric Neal AC
Chairman Westpac Banking Corporation
Mr Frank Conroy
Chief Operating Officer
Westpac Banking Corporation
12.00pm Mr Carlo Salteri
Chairman Transfield Holdings Pty Ltd
1.00pm Working Lunch:
Mr Bernard Power
Executive Chairman
Power Brewing Company Limited
Mr Daniel Smetana
Executive Chairman
Joyce Corporation Limited
2.45pm Labor Council
3.45pm The Hon N Greiner MP
Premier of New South Wales
5.00pm Mr Robert Ferguson
Managing Director
Bankers Trust Australia
